nodes.text: The Oppressor was a Harrower-class dreadnought that served as the flagship of Darth Angral during the Cold War.
This vessel was used by Darth Angral during the Cold War while he sent his apprentices after the Republic's super weapons.
He executed Orgus Din from the bridge of the cruiser while broadcasting it live on the HoloNet.
The vessel was eventually destroyed during its attack on Tython. A Jedi Knight boarded the vessel with the Padawan Kira Carsen, sabotaged its energy generators and killed Darth Angral.

The Oppressor first appeared in The Old Republic, Threat of Peace Act 1: Treaty of Coruscant, an issue of the Threat of Peace webcomic that served as a prelude for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. However, as the comic was released in 2009, two years before the game itself was released in 2011, the Oppressor looks significantly different than the finalized design for the Harrower-class dreadnought.
